about_the_game:
Insects Book

This Insects themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! A closer look into the small wilderness!
They fly, slither and scamper around us all the time but now we take a moment to admire their intricate shapes and patterns!

Contents

The Insects book unlocks the following images:

  • Worm - 42x47
  • Ladybug - 55x50
  • Rhinoceros Beetle - 75x90
  • Snail - 80x60
  • House Fly - 80x82
  • Bumble Bee - 89x85
  • Beetles - 93x47
  • Dung Beetle - 100x100
  • Caterpillar - 100x180
  • Pill Bug - 127x78
  • Cockroach - 140x75
  • Butterfly - 140x140
  • Patterns - 143x104
  • Critters - 145x45
  • Worker Ant - 155x235
  • Giant Silk Moth - 163x79
  • Stick Bug - 170x125
  • Scorpion - 188x122
  • Praying Mantis - 200x120
  • Dragonfly - 201x126

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
